alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Henrico (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:28PM EDT until July 29 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... The City of Richmond in central Virginia... Chesterfield County in central Virginia... Southern Henrico County in central Virginia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 727 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Manakin to 8 miles southwest of Bon Air to Moseley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Richmond, Colonial Heights, Downtown Richmond, Bon Air, Virginia Union University, Virginia Commonwealth University, University Of Richmond, Chester, Highland Springs, Tuckahoe, Bensley, Bellwood, Chesterfield Court House, East Highland Park, Chesterfield, Richmond Heights, Elko, Montrose, Sandston, and Glendale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
